O NAMOA É UMA FERRAMENTA COMPUTACIONAL Q: Namoa is a tool that assists in the selection of tour itineraries and the management of the trip budget. Through a search algorithm that finds relevant results based on user preferences, it is possible, through a simple and intuitive interface, to define the number of days in each city, how much will be spent daily and the places to be visited.
A POSSIBILIDADE DE INSERIR NOVOS TRADES: The possibility of inserting new Tourist Trades (hotels, restaurants, bars, discotheques, means of transport and tourist points), make the tool dynamic and intuitive, since they allow the prior planning of a script, as well as its customization in real time.
A BUSCA DOS PONTOS PARA O ROTEIRO OCORRE: The search for the points for the script occurs after filling in information that aims to draw the profile of the user, in order to better target the searches according to their lifestyle, preferences and purchasing power. All this is accessible through web platform or mobile devices.
O MODELO DE NEGÓCIO QUE MANTÉM ESTE PROJ: The business model that maintains this project is realized through packages of clicks from ads searches that the users realize, at the moment in which they construct the itinerary tourist. The charge will only occur if the tourist clicks on that Trade.
OUTRO DIFERENCIAL É O FATO DE QUE O TURI: Another difference is the fact that the tourist can give feedback to the visited establishment, promoting the continuous improvement of the quality of the service provided.
